@NathanHuman I left a trail of breadcrumbs but they picked them up, bagged em & sold them for Â£6 a bag! They called them foraged breadies!

Oh my days I'm lost in the hugest whole foods & I can't get out & it's so intense with all the stuff. This may be my most pathetic moment.

@zoe_ross12 it needs more digging, turning over & watering before your eyes see it. Its so messy. I'm all over it tho. Very soon. Promise x
